tag_default_description: Hapoom! Is a share house for start-ups, college students, and recent grads. We gather a diverse group of people to share experiences and make a comfortable home together.
tag_default_title: Hapoom: Share house for Entrepreneurs and Startups
tag_default_keywords: sharehouse, startup, seoul, room, gangnam, house, roommate, rent, coliving, hapoom, hapoom sharehouse, hapoom house
home_main_1:
Share House for
Recent Grads, Start-ups, College Students
home_bottom_3:
- Anyone eager to learn more about others and share experiences together!
- Someone who enjoys life and understands living together.
house_procedure_description:
Hapoom has a strict policy on manners & etiquette
Our Hapoom residents are selected through a strict process of: filling out a tour request, and an interview.
house_procedure_3: 3. Take a tour of facilities, and interview
house_notify_1_description: Minimum 2 month ~ max. 12 months (1 month standard)
house_notify_3_description:
Utilities included (Electric, Water, Heat/Cooling, Internet)
Household items included(soap,laundry detergent, trash, toilet paper)
house_notify_4_description: Weekday cleaning for living room, bathroom, all shared spaces
house_notify_5_description:
Refrigerator, microwave, induction stove, rice cooker, toaster
cooking supplies, water filter, washer/dryer
house_notify_7_description: No Smoking in all areas including garden
house_faq_q_1: Where can I find price information?
house_faq_a_1: Please contact info@hapoom.co for price inquiries!
house_faq_a_2: No there is no curfew, however please be mindful of fellow residents.
house_faq_q_3: Can I invite friends or family?
house_faq_a_3: Please let the staff members know before hand, visiting hours of 15mins +/- is allowed however overnight stays are prohibited.
house_room_extra_service_detail: Americano coffee -FREE, Discount off Cafe menu, CAPS Security Service, Cesco, Daily Cleaning Service, Community Management
house_address: 51-13, Teheran-ro 5-gil, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

home_cafe_intro_subtitle: Taste the best roasted coffee at Hapoom cafe!
home_cafe_intro_content: Cafe Hapoom's signature royal blend is made of a mixture of beans from Ethiopia, Indonesia, Brazil, and Costa Rica. This blend gives our coffee a balanced and smooth flavor and  smell. Our coffee is provided at the prime time for taste after roasting,

team_intro: We are a close-knit team of talented engineers, hackers and business gurus who have a passion for what we do. We believe that vision, communication, respect and adaptability are the foundations for any powerful business.  We follow the principles of ‘always doing the right thing’ and ‘keeping consumers first’. We value talent, hard work, resourcefulness and positivity. We encourage creativity and reward results. Join us as we lead the innovative culture of enjoying, transferring and sharing files.
